amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to providing access to necessary equipment for Medicare beneficiaries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1028 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1028 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Vitter.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1028 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1028 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Vitter.
